tool_description: An IFRS compliant Accounting API that caters to all financial reporting needs.
name: Microbooks
title: Microbooks

api_list.name: transactionCurrencies
api_list.description:
Retrieves a list of foreign Currencies used in transactions during the Reporting period.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| acccount-id | optional, integer | Filters the returned currencies to those used in transactions for the given account. Account with the given Id must exist. |

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The Id of the Reporting Period

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/reporting-period/1/transaction-currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/reporting-period/{id}/transaction-currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: balanceSheetPdf
api_list.description: Returns the Balance Sheet as a PDF docment.

api_list.name: openingBalances
api_list.description:
Retrieves the totals of the outstanding amounts in Balance Sheet Accounts from previous Reporting Periods.

### Query Parameters:

| **Parameters** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| year | optional, integer | The year whose Balances to retrieve |

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description:
Retrieves the Closing Rates belonging to the Currency with the passed in Id.

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| year | optional, integer | The year to Closing Rates for |

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| start-date | optional, date | The earliest validity of the Exchange Rates to retrieve |
| end-date | optional, date | The latest validity of the Exchange Rates to retrieve |

api_list.name: listClosingTransactions
api_list.description:
Lists the Closing Transactions for the given Reporting Period.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| acccount-id | optional, integer | Filters the closing transactions to those entered for the given account. Account with the given Id must exist. |

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The Id of the Reporting Period

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: openingBalances
api_list.description:
Retrieves the opening Balances for the Account with the passed in Id and the year given.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| year | optional, integer | The specific year whose Opening Balances to retrieve |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/account/1/balances"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: agingSchedule
api_list.description:
Retrieves a schedule of Payable and Receivable accounts and their outstanding balances categorized by how long they have been outstanding.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| end-date | optional, date | The latest date of the Balances to retrieve |
| currency-id | optional, integer | Filter the Transactions in the balances by the Currency given |

optional_parameters.name: account-type
optional_parameters.description: The type of Schedule to fetch balances for. Must be one of: RECEIVABLE, PAYABLE

api_list.name: accountSchedule
api_list.description:
Retrieves the outstanding (Clearable) Transactions of the Account as at the given end date.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| start-date | optional, date | The earliest date of the Transactions to retrieve |
| end-date | optional, date | The latest date of the Transactions to retrieve |
| currency-id | optional, integer | Filter the Transactions by the Currency given |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/account/1/schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: accountStatement
api_list.description:
Retrieves a chronological list of Transactions posted for the account during the given period.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| start-date | optional, date | The earliest date of the Transactions to retrieve |
| end-date | optional, date | The latest date of the Transactions to retrieve |
| currency-id | optional, integer | Filter the Transactions by the Currency given |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/account/1/statement"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/account/{id}/statement"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: assignments

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: categoryAccounts
api_list.description:
Retrieves the Balances of the Accounts belonging to the Category with the passed in Id.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| start-date | optional, date | The earliest date of the Transactions in the balances to retrieve |
| end-date | optional, date | The latest date of the Transactions in the balances to retrieve |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com/books/v1/category/1/accounts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "microbooks1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: sectionMovement
api_list.description:
Shows the change in balances for Accounts of type SECTION during the given period.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| start-date | optional, date | The earliest date of the Transactions in the balances to retrieve |
| end-date | optional, date | The latest date of the Transactions in the balances to retrieve |

optional_parameters.name: section
optional_parameters.description: The Balance Sheet section whose total balance movement to retrieve. Must be one of the sections defined in the Balance Sheet Report

api_list.name: getTaxes

api_list.name: closingTransactions
api_list.description:
Retrieves the Closing Transactions Posted for the Account for the given year.

### Optional Query Parameters:

| **Parameter** | **Attributes** | **Notes** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| year | optional, integer | The specific year whose Transactions to retrieve |
